pkgmetadata.longdescription: Description-----------.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/enricobacis/limit/master/.screenshot/limit.gif :target: https://asciinema.org/a/4f621lbwvpgf91neshex89nrm :align: centerThis decorator limits the calling rate of the decorated function. This isuseful in conjuction with web API calls, where you often get banned if youperform more calls than the ones specified in the terms of services.The rate is ``limit`` over ``every``, where limit is the number of invocationallowed every ``every`` seconds. ``limit(4, 60)`` creates a decorator thatlimits the function calls to *4 per minute*. If not specified, ``every``defaults to ``1`` second... code:: python @limit(4, 60) def function(...): """never invoke this function more than 4 times per minute.""" ...Installation------------The package has been uploaded to `PyPI`_, so you can install it with pip: pip install limit.. _PyPI: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/limit
